alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 7:55PM MST until November 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6000 feet. Snow accumulation could range between 3 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Kaibab Plateau above 6000 feet, including Jacob Lake and the North Rim of the Grand Canyon. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, with areas of blowing and drifting snow and near-zero visibility, at times. Additional snow forecast from 7 PM Today to 5 PM Thursday: Jacob Lake 4 to 6 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
